'''Starlit Letter''' is a [[Web Event]] in [[Version 4.3]].

==Event Duration==
* 2024/01/18 12:00 – 2024/01/24 23:59 (UTC+8)

==Summary==
With Paimon's guidance, follow the character tracks to recall how you met your companions on your journey. After hearing a certain number of iconic character voice-overs, you'll be able to unlock the related tracks and characters in the Archive.

You'll be able to obtain Primogem rewards after unlocking the first 5 character tracks.

Voice recording-related permissions may not be activated properly due to some issues with App authorization. Travelers can copy the event link to their browser to fully enjoy the event~

==Event Rewards==
Unlock the first 5 character tracks, then tap the image to share the event and claim Primogems.

{{Card|Primogem|40}}
